body_html:
You need to implement it in THS/THCS (for CPU and CUDA tensors) and expose it to Python. I don't think we link with cblas at the moment so I guess we could leave the CPU function that only raises an error that it's no implemented (using THError). Here are some pointers:

  • Implementation of sparse dense multiplication in C backend
  • Its Python bindings
body_text:
You need to implement it in THS/THCS (for CPU and CUDA tensors) and expose it to Python. I don't think we link with cblas at the moment so I guess we could leave the CPU function that only raises an error that it's no implemented (using THError). Here are some pointers:

Implementation of sparse dense multiplication in C backend
Its Python bindings
body:
You need to implement it in THS/THCS (for CPU and CUDA tensors) and expose it to Python. I don't think we link with cblas at the moment so I guess we could leave the CPU function that only raises an error that it's no implemented (using `THError`). Here are some pointers:
* [Implementation of sparse dense multiplication in C backend](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/0f458ee3c498444c3519841b7300cb9e7e6f67f1/torch/lib/THCS/generic/THCSTensorMath.cu#L43-L153)
* [Its Python bindings](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/743e4894d2865108dc0ea2a1f344d9f34eb2b29d/torch/csrc/generic/methods/SparseTensor.cwrap#L201-L215)
